Crimes.Legal_Issue: Validity of removal orders under subsection 44(2) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, subsection 44(2)
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Timing of report review versus issuance of removal orders
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Removal orders declared illegal and nullified
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On applicants to challenge validity of orders
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Removal orders require prior review by Minister or delegate under subsection 44(2)
Crimes.Standard_of_Review: Reasonableness or correctness (implied judicial review standard)
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Removal orders issued before required review
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Violation of procedural fairness due to retroactive review
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Dates of report preparation, review, and order issuance
Crimes.Legal_Rule_Source: Subsection 44(2), Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Official reports and dates of authorization
Crimes.Outcome: Orders declared void, tribunal decision set aside
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Subsection 44(2), Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Applicable_Process: Administrative removal process with judicial review

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to comply with residency obligations under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Involved: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, residency requirements
Crimes.Outcome: Removal orders invalidated due to procedural error
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Invalid issuance of removal orders without prior review
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of tribunal decision upholding removal orders
Crimes.Standard_of_Review: Judicial review standard applied to administrative decisions
Crimes.Evidence_Requirement: Documentation of compliance with residency obligations and procedural steps in removal process
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Tribunal decision set aside; removal orders declared void
Crimes.Institutional_Action: Issuance of removal orders by immigration officer
Crimes.Government_Body_or_Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board, Minister of Immigration
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Residency records, officer reports, review timelines
Crimes.Governing_Body: Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship
Crimes.Complaint_Issues: Procedural fairness in removal order issuance
Crimes.Protection_Claim: Right to procedurally fair administrative process
Crimes.State_Protection_Assessment: Adequacy of internal remedies assessed via judicial review
Crimes.Victim_Basis: Individuals affected by invalid removal orders
